• EXPERIENCE

    The Iron Yard — Atlanta, GA (Learn More)
    Front End Engineering Student: Fall 2014

    The Iron Yard is a three-month code school focusing on development of web applications using JavaScript. I built and deployed a variety of applications such as blogging platforms, interactive games and social websites. Our projects involved everything from the fundamentals of structure and styling (using tools such as Sass and Bourbon/Neat), to JavaScript frameworks (AngularJS and Backbone).

    Books-A-Million — Birmingham, AL (Learn More)
    Digital Designer: Summer 2012 – Present

    My responsibilities at BAM’s corporate office included designing and coding email campaigns, creating and maintaining websites, developing in-store signage and managing a variety of creative projects from within the marketing department.

    Shred Ready — Auburn, AL (Learn More)
    Graphic Designer: Spring 2010 – Spring 2011, Fall 2011 – Summer 2012

    At Shred Ready, a watersport helmet company, I managed any and all graphic design needs, such as creating seasonal catalogues, magazine ads, tradeshow exhibits, web banners, and helmet graphics, as well as managing all product photography, website content, and technical drawings.
